name: Sweet Jump - Endless Arcade Jumper Game
name_original: Sweet Jump - Endless Arcade Jumper Game
description:
Prepare yourself for a delightful mouthwatering treat.
Enter the kingdom of sweets where skies change color from aquamarine to tangerine and where whole mountains are made of dark and milky chocolate.

With intuitive and easy controls Sweet Jump is an adventure suitable for children and grown-ups alike.

How to play:
Tap on the screen to change the direction of the character, avoid falling off the chocolate cubes.

Features:
● Simple one tap control
● Tasty graphics
● Endless sweet candy adventure
● Power-ups and coins
● Unlock several cute and yummy characters
● Compare scores in global leaderboards

Pounce gracefully on blocks of sugary delight while making your way down the mountains. Collect delicious power-ups and coins and avoid treacherous obstacles.

The kingdom of candy and sweets awaits you!
